name: Tiny Zombies Experiment - VR
description:
Game is work in progress. 

Basically there is one zombie (patient zero), that starts to infect the entire town.
How fast will the infection spread? and can you stop it?

This is a very early working prototype to test the gameplay.

It is tested without VR headset with mouse/wasd, as well as with xbox 360 controller.

For VR it's tested with Oculus Rift. Please let me know if it works/does not work with other headsets.

Use Alt-F4 or Oculus panel to exit game.

Shoot with controllers (left/right mouse or trigger).

Use R to reload if no headset. in VR just point guns upwards (only works if you have no ammo left)

NOTE: You can't control individual hands without VR, so it might be more difficult to shoot and hit. Once you get the hang of it, it's quite playable though ;)
